contentrichtext.text: {{More footnotes|date=April 2009}} '''Zhaoyuan''' ({{zh|s=招远|t=招遠|p=Zhāoyuǎn}}) is a [[county-level city]] within the [[prefecture-level city]] of [[Yantai]], [[Shandong]] Province of China. It is on seashore of [[Bohai Sea]]. Zhaoyuan is well known for its abundant gold deposit and production. In 2002 Zhaoyuan was named "China's Gold City" by China's gold association. ==Tourist attractions== "Asia's largest statue of ''[[Ao (turtle)|Ao]]''" (a mythical giant turtle), 15 m tall and 20 m long, in Luoshan State Forest Park (罗山国家森林)<ref>[http://www.jnwdds.com/show.asp?id=553 招远罗山《金鳌》]</ref><ref>"Golden Ao", [http://www.panoramio.com/photo/23000576 photo on Panoramio.com]</ref> It can be easily seen on Google Maps satellite photos at {{coord|37|27|36|N|120|28|22|E|region:CN-62_type:landmark}}. ==Notable people== *[[Chi Haotian]], [[People's Liberation Army|PLA]] [[General]], [[Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China]] *[[Sun Baoguo]], [[BTBU]] [[Professor]], [[Academician]] of [[Chinese Academy of Engineering]] ==External links== *[http://www.zhaoyuan.gov.cn Official website of Zhaoyuan Government] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{coord|37|21|32.40|N|120|23|45.60|E|region:CN-37_type:city(580000)_source:dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:Cities in Shandong]] {{Shandong-geo-stub}}
